title: tryitout
description: Building libraries should be the main priority. Once you do that, it should be about sharing them with the world.

body.value: > [`tryitout`](https://github.com/gabrielcsapo/tryitout) allows you to quickly create a demo page for any frontend library or framework you create!

Using this is so simple, just simple create a tryitout.json file with the contents adhering to the following 
```json
{
   "title":"String"
   "description":"String"
   "source":"Url",
   "output":"Path"
   "body":"Array",
   "externals":"Array"
}
```

Then all you need to do is run `tryitout`
